article_title: Obama to Nominate Ex-Pentagon Lawyer Jeh Johnson for Homeland Security Post
article_text:
WASHINGTON—President Barack Obama picked Jeh Johnson, an experienced Defense Department lawyer and administration loyalist, to succeed Janet Napolitano as Homeland Security chief.

The nomination announcement was set for Friday afternoon, an administration official said. The choice comes as something of a surprise as Mr. Johnson wasn't among the...
